page.title: 17An Ordinary Day (Cont.)
page.content:
Before collecting the children from school at 3.30 pm I try to finish the housework and perhaps put in an hour or so in the garden. If I'm lucky I also get the evening meal prepared which gives me time to spend with the children when they come home from school.
After dinner the children have their baths and get ready for bed. It's the time of day I enjoy the most, when the children are chatting and telling me about all that has happened to them during the day. They all read before they go to sleep and they sometimes bring some school work home to practice with me.
Once they are all asleep, I clear the kitchen and do any chores which remain unfinished. I go out two or three
